1. Click on the name of your report to open it.
  2. Your Report will contain an initial information page
    • If an Assignment has been allocated a mark by the Teacher, the mark (which will be a percentage) will display.
    • If a Test Yourself activity has been assigned the report will also contain further report pages for more in-depth information on the Test result - click on any underlined text (such as student names or question titles) to view them.

You can export the information within a report to another format, such as a spreadsheet, by clicking the Export button.
